name: Angel Food Cake Roll Up (Cake)
author: Shirley Eftink
instructions: Prepare an angel food cake mix as directed on the box. Pour batter into a 12 x 16 inch cookie sheet lined with waxed paper. Bake until edges are golden brown or cake springs back when touched in the center. While cake is still hot, turn over onto a towel sprinkled with powdered sugar. Peel off waxed paper. Carefully roll towel and cake from wide end. Cool completely.
